recipes.title: Ring Kebab
recipes.preparation: Peel the eggplants in a striped pattern and slice them into half finger-width pieces. Then, add salt to a bowl of water and mix, place the eggplants in the water for 20 minutes to remove their bitterness. Peel the onions and slice them into circular shapes.

recipes.title: Stuffed Eggplant (Karniyarik)
recipes.preparation: Peel the eggplants in stripes and soak them in salted water for half an hour to prevent oil absorption. After washing thoroughly, dry them with a towel and fry in little oil. Fry 3 peppers in the oil as well. Then, in the same pan, sauté the chopped onions, add the ground meat and cook for a while, then add peppers and garlic and cook for 2 more minutes.

recipes.title: Sultan's Chicken Kebab
recipes.preparation: Peel the eggplant in stripes, cut into small pieces and fry in oil. Let it drain in a colander while you sauté the chicken. Cut the chicken into small cubes and cook in a pot, stirring occasionally. When it changes color and releases its juices, add the chopped onion.

recipes.title: Ring Kebab

recipes.title: Stuffed Eggplant (Karniyarik)

Fry 3 peppers in the oil as well. Then, in the same pan, sauté the chopped onions, add the ground meat and cook for a while, then add peppers and garlic and cook for 2 more minutes.

recipes.title: Sultan's Chicken Kebab
recipes.preparation: Peel the eggplant in stripes, cut into small pieces and fry in oil. Let it drain in a colander while you sauté the chicken. Cut the chicken into small cubes and cook in a pot, stirring occasionally. When it changes color and releases its juices, add the chopped onion.

recipes.title: Holiday Dessert
ingredients: A little less than half a tea glass of vegetable oil
recipes.preparation: First, prepare the syrup. Put the syrup ingredients in a pot and bring to a boil. Once it starts boiling, simmer on medium heat for 12 minutes and let it cool. Then, prepare the filling. Combine semolina, milk, and vanilla in a pot and whisk until it starts boiling. Let the semolina filling cool. For the dough, combine all dough ingredients except the flour in a mixing bowl. Gradually add flour and knead to obtain a soft dough that does not stick to your hands.

recipes.title: Easy Chocolate Cake
recipes.preparation: For the cake, place the eggs in a mixing bowl. Add sugar and whisk until foamy. Add vegetable oil and milk. Then, sift flour, cocoa, baking powder, and vanilla into the bowl and mix again. Pour the prepared mixture into a greased square baking dish (29 cm x 29 cm) and spread evenly.
